title: PLEASE HELP ME WITH THESE FONTS
content:
Hello everyone,

I’m planing to print some of my old soccer shirts with name and number.

It would be very mych appreciated if someone could help me to indetify the type of the lettering but also of the numbers.

Pic no.1

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080308200050im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pic001_4546.jpg)

Pic no.2

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080308200050im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pic002_5998.jpg)

Pic no.3

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080308200050im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pic003_6215.jpg)

 [‹ T.I.M.E. font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080308200050/http:/typophile.com/node/42832 "Go to previous forum topic") [Green Thumb Guys ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080308200050/http:/typophile.com/node/42858 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eduardo9

comments.content: From the FAQ: [And logos of sports teams?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080308200050/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_16)
I see, but still there might be someone here that can help as the fonts doesn’t look very rare.
If you don’t mind similar you can get close to the top two using Machine. The bottom you could use Eurostile.
